content:
Consensus Networks is a healthcare technology company working to reinvent medical supply chains. Founded with the goal of creating trusted data environments to derive novel insights, Consensus enables clients to integrate clinical and supply chain data across the value chain to reduce costs and improve patient outcomes. We are looking for a software engineer experienced with EHR and other health IT systems to further our HealthNet platform's ability to integrate into Healthcare Systems.

https://angel.co/company/consensus-networks/jobs/1139362-ehr-integration-engineer

Work Location: Anywhere - US preferred. Special Requirements: Permitted to work in the US with potential eligibility for US government security clearance
